title: Why is there no loss prevented for this yet?
body:
Why hasn't there been loss prevented for thing like this yet? This is almost immediately after the message about people disconnecting disappearing. Like, surely theres some way to detect that its 4v5 and the person didnt even connect.

This year there has been loss prevention for server issues, where people were disconnecting in and out of game, isn't someone not connecting at all a lot worse?
